text: mamath hithuwa eeka hondayi.
nathnam me malakada kapu yakada godawal gana melo yakekut kiyawanna hithenawada ban..
ee mithya kathawalata anuwa wampayarayaku winasha karanna nam li ulakin hadawatha siduru karanna oona.
mama podi ekekuta uganwana gaman aawe uuta ganak hadanna dila..
kalumanike thawath kopayata path wuwaya.
amaru karyaya wanuye sangatha wa boru gethima ya.
aththata ma aasayi me widihata ma jiwath wenna.
me awasan husma wenna athi.
dan menna kathawa oba wetha idiripath kirimata garu metriks thuma wetha mayikrafonaya...sahaya wisthara kathanaya magen.
ee atharathura kathawan wiwidha pathi osse giya.
namuth 2013 wasare di murilo hata urahis sathkamakata bhajanaya wannata sidu wu athara ee nisama ema mulu tharaga waraya purawatama jathika kandayamen iwath wi sitimata sidu wuna.
kawuruth ekayi appa.baleta thiyena kadara kama.
me parlimenthuwa wisirewwoth awashya sanshodhana walata 2/3k ganne komada?
"mama aadarayen peluna.."
nidahas welanda katayuthu sambandhayen awadhanaya yomukaramin sangamayen iwathwimata aya pasugiya kalaye thiranaya kalaya.
winadiyayi.. . .
namuth obe karunu dakwima matha mata thibu pahatha gata pada liha ganimata haki wu bawa sthuthi purwakawa danwami.
mata eeta wada godak dewal thawa hithanna thiyenawa.
dan jawipe kandayam eeye pereda dakwa ekata siti siya parani sahodarayan wishayehi hasirenne da, ithihasaye kawadawath hamu no wunu nannandunana piris wetha prathichara dakwanna se ya.
pudumayen pudumayata pathwela pora lahiyata kiyapi..
apata eeken kadayak dunna nam me badu tika wassata thiyannawath.
kamathi nadda poddak athitheta gihin enna..
ahu unanam bolage passawal katin enna kanawa aaye hodanna deyak na...
attapitiya balakotuwa thamayi nawa 1939 wenakam aranayaka awata pradeshaye palana madhyasthanaya lesa thibune.
madakalapuwa – polonnaruwa margaye dhawanaya wu magi prawahana pudgalika bas rathayaka idiripasa doratuwen adala pudgalaya adawati athi bawa polisiya pawasuweya.
ee wagema kollange kanen adili, guti diwili dakala kiwwa ane mata nam ba mehe iskole yanna kiyala .
pushpa jiwa widyawa saha kruthrima paragana sarthakathwaya.

peradeniya wishwawidyalayen shasthrawedi upadhiya labagena dana ugath tharuna bhikshuwak lesa adhyapanika sewawata awathirna wemin piriwen kipayakama pariwenadhipathidhuraya daramin suwishala sewayak sidukalaha.
wiharadhipathi pujya kappetiyagoda gunawansha nahimiyange anushasakathwayen wesak pinkama sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.
janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha polonnaruwa rajakiya widyalaye pihiti chanda madhyasthanayedi siya chandaya prakasha kaleya.
ee kiyanne marliborn krikat samajayen.
me premayaka prathipalayaki.

ada pawathi ejapa kruthyadhikari mandala raswime di eksath jathika pakshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathi lesa prathamika karmantha amathya daya gamage mahathath, lanka jathika wathu sewaka sangamaye sabhapathithwayata amathya harin pranandu mahathatath, lakwanitha peramune sabhapathithwaya khanija sampath sanwardhana ni.amathya anoma gamage mahathmiyatath, jathika sewaka sangamaye sabhapathi dhuraya adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahathatath,jathika yowun peramune sabhapathi dhuraya parlimenthu manthri kawinda jayawardhana mahathatath laba di thibe.
owun depalata daruwan labuna pasu owun dedenada gnyathin bawata pathwimada sammuthiyaki.
di es unnahane jathiye piya

me bomba praharayata sambandha thrasthawadinta ayath aayudha thogayak sanche dathge niwase thibi hamuwiya. 1993 apriyel 1 wanida sanche dath athadanguwata gath indiyanu rajaya thrasthawadaya ha winashakari kriya walakwime panatha yatathe ohu rimand kaleya.
miniththu 132ka dhawana kalayakin yuthu chithrapataya sandaha wayakala mudala amarikanu dolar miliyana 3.5k.

kshudra jiwin saha roga
dewa wishwasawanthayan hara wena kisiwakutath mema bhagyaya labenne natha.
eekedi apita kiyanna puluwan wenne, meka ithama honda sanskruthika mewalamak kiyala thamayi.
"nuthana kuwenila-nuthana wijayala saha sirisenala gana wena lipiyaka katha kalanam thama wada honda...
sama niwasakama sitama mema huwamaruwata wena wenama wayar ade (warthamanaye nam mitath wada diyunu labha krama anugamanaya wana bawada sihithaba ganna).
gowin pawasanuye loku lunu kilowa rupiyal 40-60 athara milakata illana bawayi.

wire ayiyata penune age muhuna.ee muna puduma widihata siriyawanthayi.eeth hangim
nelumyaya sanwidhayaka mandalayata ee lakuna sambhandhayen mage sathishaya kanagatuwa prakasha karanawa.
ithihasaya wenas kala nohaka.
“nanda akamathi nemeyi.
pu nchi ewun kale wage athangillak patalagena..
21 wana siyawasedi yathurupadi nishpadanaya p radhana washayen balapawathwanne china yathurupadi karmanthaya saha japan yathurupadi nishpadana samagam wisini.
oyage yane harima lassanayi.
ema nisa mahanuwara disthrikkaya thula eksath jathika pakshaya aaraksha kara ganimin shakthimathwa idiriyata ya yuthuyi.

agamathi bandaranayaka mahathage wishwasaya dinagath samipa kabinat sagayaku washayen kriya kala ilangarathna mahatha ema rajaya thula athiwu wama - dakuna amathi mandala arbudayedi agamathithuma aaraksha kirime prathipaththiyaka sita katayuthu kaleya.
kochchara kalath sahimakata path wenne nathi hethuwa thamayi ee pitipasse thiyena yam yam balawega.
mata nam jiwitheta ohoma dewal wela naha ban.umbaa mona karanna gihinda kelawa gaththe?
eya beda harinu labu pathrikawak magin daduwam labiya yuthu kriyawak lesa nam kara thibe.
kese wunath obe adahasata sthuthiyi.
iskolen ayin unata passe mama gedarata barak nowi inna loku gemak dunna.
uparima waidya pa්rathikara yanu wenama sankalpayakata wada uparima waidya wadidiyunuwa nam sankalpaye diguwaki.

lowa pramukha pele saukhya sewawak sapayana ratawal dahaya athurin pramukha darshaka sapayana nedarlanthaya roginta “nikan dima” wenuwata siya wishwasaya thaba aththe rogiya “thrupthimath kirima” kerehiya.
anik athata mulu jiwithayama pinkarala anthima mohothe naraka sithiwillakin marena kenek naraka thanaka ipadunath ee pin balaya nisama akalaye miyayanawalu..
sira walla ( kolambaa aa hati ) chandare kolambaa aapu kathawa pahugiya dawasaka dammane nobalapu aya innawanam menna linkuwa "chandare kolambaa aa hati" gihin bala ganna.
aawa muna gasunu pasuwa me katayuththa sandaha aawa kamathi kara ganimata ma hata sahena kalayak gatha wu athara, eya asiru prayathnayak wu bawata obata kiwa yuthumaya.
ee pilibanda owun kisiwaku danuwath kirimata katayuthu kara naha.
rajaya thaman yana gamana gana nawatha nawatha sitha balima owun ge anagatha suba siddhiyata wadadayi weyi kiyala apita hithenawa.mokada janathawa sighralesa wikalpa soyanawa!
budu hamuduruwo ahuwalu obathumanlage pradhana kama jathiya mokadda kiyala . .
fatitayi machan.niyama wadak.jaya ho
kese namuth dewana loka yuddhayata pera ha athishaya wadagath yudha kalaya thula di jaiwa indhana aanayanika thelwalata wikalpayak lesa agayanu labiya.
atham widwathun wishwasa karanne ohu siya miyagiya piyanan anusmaranaya kirima pinisa gisahi maha sfinksaya idikala bawayi.
eelangata apita daka ganna puluwan gotham polis departhamenthuwe athulatha darshanayak.
eekata oya kandulu pera pera anduwe.
habarana, eerioya gammanaye atharin pathara pihiti niwasa pahakata perawaru 9.00-10.00 athara di kahawasi wati atha.
(wyayama kirimata pera rogi sandhiye thel galwima chalanayanta pahasuwe.)
mamath gihin wadi una.

aththatama pasugiya kalaye lankawe thibuna yudha parisaraya thula ape sinama karuwanta boho abhiyoga walata muhuna dimata siduwuna.dan ema thathwaya sampurnayenma maga hari thikhenawa.ee anuwa apata aluth panak labi thikhenawa.
kese wethath upan aawega awankawa muda harinnata giya obawahanse awasanaye khedaniya lesa deshapalanikawa awabhawitha wuyeya.
loku pidanayak danuna.
ekak balakotuwaka kathawak, mashal dhawalapasha kiyala buwek hitiya mathakayi..
meyin adahas wanne dinapatha athiwishala pramanayen ekathu wana mema kunu parama arthayakin athurudahan wana bawa nowe.
ohoma adinna epa aaye..
“ oya katada me bonikkawa denna yanne”mama ahuwa.
ee wishwasaya bindunu wita mudal nikamma kadadasi kali pamani.
oya dannawa mama kawuda kiyala..

kohewath liyala thibuna mathaka natha....boho wehesakari rassawak bawa dana hitiya wagema jiwitha anathuru wadiyi .....

kirthi mendistharuniyan rawata lingika athawara kirima ha maraniya tharjana ella kirim pilibanda labunu paminillak matha kolambaa disthrik eksath jathika peramune apekshakayaku wu susil kindelpitiya mahatha mirihana polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena atha.ekthara kanthawak wisin mirihana polisiyata karana lada paminillak matha sakakaru athadanguwata gath bawath age prakashaya  anuwa ohugen me wanawita polisiya prashna karagena yana bawath polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari prashantha jayakodi mahatha ‘silumina’ ta kiya.thawath awiwahaka kanthawak samanga siya motar rathayen gaman karamin sitiyadi sakakaru athadanguwata gath bawa nugegoda kottasa bara polis adhikari deshabandu thennakon mahatha ‘silumina’ ta pawasiya.nawika hamudawen pana giya sebaleku da sakakaru samanga sita atha.
bima athpath karagath prag pethihasika manawayo diwayina pura wisira
own ada peni sitin wenath nam walini.

kautil yage artha shastha ් ra ga ් ranthaya parani raj ya thantha ් raya pilibada upadesha wak ya pamanak nowa hasthin gawane wananthara aaraksha karannan wani niladharinge wagakim gana da pahadiliwa sadahan karayi.

kesenamuth winisuru kala me warada sadharanaya karamin nipanduwa anith anthaye siti dhananjaya silwa nodakke mak nisada yana moda tharkayak tharangaya wicharaya kala indiya wicharakayan saha tharangaya sajiwiwa wikashaya karana web adawi mathu karana aakarayada dakagatha haki wiya.

namuth obe palamu wakya kotas deka thulin gamyamana wenne mayada adu sanyamayakin yuthuwa lipiya liya athi bawak.namuth obath samaga siyayata siyayak ekaga wiya nohakiyi.mokada ee mage mathayaya wana bawini....jaya wewa

thawada mema yathrawa nipadawima sandaha mulika salasma saha awashya daththayan shri lanka nawika hamuda kimidum anshaye wisheshagnya danumathi niladhariyeku wana komadoru priyantha perera niladharithuma wisin labadi atha.

hith ahasa pura goshis idak ahidagenanumbaawa siththam karannam....duka sathuta ekathu karakalu sudu warnayennumbaage hada thala mawannam.........minis jiwiyeku thawa nathihisma his hith ahasenumbaa langin man radennam.........kapparak senehasaknumbae namata diyakaranaadaren mama isinnam........thigassena tharu as walin numbae ihirena aadare dothata ek karannam.......oya dethol sali salisiruwata mumunana wadanasagena man hidinnam........susinidu sithala dath numbae gena himin paputhure man ruwa gannam.........hiswa athi numbae lama mathalewata rahasin aadaren man waru wennam .......eyin kiyawena rahas hama gena numbaata perala kiyannam..........sihin susuman numbaa helana sada thawath dingak thurulu wennam...........witin wita numbae asi piyan yata punchi kawiyak liyannam..........himin ehe mehe duwana tharu as mage langa man sathapawannam...........inda hitaka wewlana dethol pethi gena sithalen man dowannam..........himin keherali athara dangakara mage athangili yawannam ...........siyum kammul horen dasin numbaata rahasin simbainnam...........gewena hama mohothakama me lesa numbaata lan wi hidinnam........
aanduwa gena ennata hadana nawa wyawastha sanshodhanaya haraha apa awurudu dahas gananak pura apa rakagath ape urumaya ahimi karamin athi bawa gewindu kumarathunga mahatha penwa deyi.
mal sindu ahanneth na kiyanneth na

sancharaka sha්ri lanka kandayama ha indiyanu kandayama athara pawathwimata niyamitha ekdina tharagawaliya sadaha ka්rida karana 15denekugen yuth sha්ri lanka sanchithaya eeye pa්rakashayata path karanu labuwa.
me rate hondin igena ganna wadi dena pitarata gihilla dolar hamba karanne.
api pawulak, hari?

“idiriyedi mewani de sidu wima walakwimata” gamwasin danuwath kirime wadasatahan kriyathmaka kara athi athara, siddhiyata muhuna dun kanthawan dedenata aarakshawa sapaya athi bawa polisiya prakasha kaleya.
ethakota e sathage thiyana wisa godak ewelema eliyata yanawalu...
madhu unath mata hondata galapuna..
widyawe wiwidha aakara aithihasikawa wardhanaya wuye darshanayen ho wadath niwaradiwa pawasanawanam swabhawika darshanayeni.
ekala ratehi lunu hingayak pawathiyen pirisidu lunaු soya gruhaniyo wehesunoya.
deshapalanika bala thanhawath, ee magin athi kerena gatumkari thathwayath thawakalika sansiddhiyak pamanak wethayi api apeksha karamu.

daru prasuthiyak sandaha waidyawarayeku ge sahaya pathiya hakinam sthri dushanayaka di wenas kriya margayak awasi wedayi athamun nagana prashnaya aya wetha yomu kala wita "daru prasuthiyak sandaha pirimi waidyawarayek langata yanna puluwan.

eeta amatharawa meya hudu charitha katha sangrahayak pamanak ma nowe kiyana karanawath awadharanaya kala yuthuyi.sinhala puwathpatha janamadhyayak washayen janathawa athara prachalitha kirimatath, puwathpathata yogya wu bhasha rithiyak nipadawa ganime abhiyogayatath muhunadimata ape purogami pathra karthruwarunta sidu wuna.
“apata rassawal denna, pan denna, sahanadhara denna, naya denna, puhunuwa denna, thawa salli denna,” yayi janathawa kiyathi.
prasanna withanage mahatha ‘usawiya nihandayi’ wartha chithrapataya nipadawa aththe ihatha kanthawan dedena samanga balahathkarayen lingika sansargaye yedime siduwim padaka karaganimini.
mudu ralla binda binda wali maligawa langatama galanawa...
ewelehi bhagyawath budu rajanan wahanse me gatha deka wadala.
enisama manawa garuthwaya athiwa jiwathwimata athi ayithiya samaga sanskruthika ananyatha wyawasthawata ganne keseda yanna apa aluthin aarambha kala yuthu sakachchuawaki.
eeye 9:19 pawa, kolambaa, surathal sathunru 8,000
''umbaata nam pissu ban...
eewa pani rasayi.
namuth mema yuddha kisiwak wisanda natha.
api dennatama rakiyawata yanna pahasu durakin geyak aragena dan jiwath wunath hama sathi anthekama ape demawupiyange gewal deken ekakata yanawa.
habayi wenaskam karanna oona.
ohuta siya saba sohoyuran nathi paluwa thadinma danuni.
ithin me kiyanna yanne oya wage ape hada soragaththu gallamayi hitapu femasma adwartismant kipayak gana.
dum gahala mi masso pannala miwadaya mirikanawa.athule inna mi pilawu rashiyak marenawa.
ehi deshapalakayan amathiwarun aadin pamanath nowa ostin prananduta samana swarupayak athi agamathi lekam kenekda sitiya mata mathakayi.
godak sthuthiyi ayiye...ee danena hangima harima apuruyi thama.
ehi aarambhaka kathuwaraya wu ma mithra chanuka waththegama ‘antharjalaya’ handinwuye wisulu yedumak lesayi.

kese wuwath yapanaya ardhadwipaye thibi aththe mita tharamak wenas swabhawayak - kalantharayak thisse yapanayata demala sankramaniyakayan paminiyath ihatha ki pradeshawala men nowa samakami sahajiwanayak demala ha sinhala janathawa athara thibennata athayi salakenawa - inpasu sinhala janathawa yapanayen wisthapanaya ekawarama wargika sanharayaka swarupayen nowa kramakramayen - me sinhalayan boho wita demala janagahanayatama anthargrahanaya wuwa wiya hakiyi kalayath samanga.

shri lankawa widya thakshanika maha karmika balayak bawata path kara, koriyawa paradawa, dakunu indiyawe tharunayanta pawa shri lankawe rakiya laba diyahaki thaththwayak uda kirime sihina lokawala atharaman nowi, dushana ha nasthiya awamaya karamin lakwasi apata himi soba sampath upayogi karagena kala haki lowatama aadarshayak wana parisara hithawadi sanwardhana kriyamargayak magin koti thrasthawadaya paradawa labagath nidahasa thahawuru kala yuthuya.

rajaya, kantha sanwidhana, eksath jathin ha wenath hawulkaruwan wisin kala karyabharaya kotharam wuwath prachandathwaye windithayanta rakawaranaya, saukhyarakshawa saha yukthiya labagatha haki sewawan pilibanda owunge danuwathbhawaya boho durata aduyi"
